snippet.title: Artifice: War Tactics Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Artifice: War Tactics is OUT NOW!

Buy the Game On Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1359730

Don't forget to follow us on our social media channels:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SilvineGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/silvinegamestudios/
Discord: https://discord.gg/gSwVK7CURj
Website: http://www.artificewartactics.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/silvinegamestudios

About the game: Artifice: War Tactics is a turn-based strategy roguelike game with a unique asymmetric combat system. In this game, enemies set up attack zones, while your champions can actively evade and disrupt their strategy using their traits, abilities, or items.

About Silvine Game Studios:

Founded by Neeraj Kumar, Aubhik Nath, Ekta Verma and Vishal Mohan, Silvine Game Studios is an independent developer based in Bangalore, India. After shipping Asura: Vengeance Edition for a previous studio, we got together once again to work on what would eventually become Artifice: War Tactics. Seeking to forge memorable experiences that would someday inspire others to follow their passion, Silvine Game Studios is just getting started.
